H0.text: What is the capital of Rwanda. Kigali

H1.text: What is the capital of Rwanda. Butare

H2.text: What is the capital of Rwanda. Gisenyi

H3.text: What is the capital of Rwanda. Kigli

A4.text: Kigali became the capital upon Rwandan independence in 1962.

A5.text: Two other cities were considered: Nyanza, as the traditional seat of the mwami, and the southern city of Butare (known as Astrida under the Belgians), due to its prominence as a centre of intellect and religion.
